content:
We are excited to announce a new managed service offering for our Apricot for Homelessness subscribers. Introducing the new Quality Assurance Program!
This new offering provides your organization with a dedicated HMIS subject-matter expert who will be your partner to help improve your HMIS data quality, freeing up time for your organization to spend on what matters most. Consultation is one-to-one and includes proactive compliance reporting reviews and analysis.

Please reach out to your Client Success Manger to learn more.
title: AHS | Quality Assurance Program
